RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: Unified Value Shift And Transpose
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description: Adds universal transposing / value shifting functionality. It can inc/dec values under the cursor in the pattern, e.g. volume, instrument number, note and also delay (so it can shift notes in time).
RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: jurekraben@googlemail.com
